com.dsi.ant.plugins.antplus.pcc
Interface AntPlusControlsPcc.IVideoCommandReceiver

Enclosing class:
AntPlusControlsPcc
public static interface AntPlusControlsPcc.IVideoCommandReceiver

Receiver for the VideoCommand event, which is: Commands sent by a remote control to initiate an action on a video device.

Method Summary
 int onNewVideoCommand(int currentMessageCount, int serialNumber, int sequenceNumber, int commandNumber, int commandData)
          Receives the data from a VideoCommand event.
 

Method Detail

onNewVideoCommand

int onNewVideoCommand(int currentMessageCount,
                      int serialNumber,
                      int sequenceNumber,
                      int commandNumber,
                      int commandData)
Receives the data from a VideoCommand event.

Parameters:
currentMessageCount - The value of the message counter when this event was triggered. Useful for correlating multiple events. Rollover: the count is an integer incremented by one each message, rolling through the entire integer range.
serialNumber - The serial number of the remote control device.
sequenceNumber - Sequence number which increments with each new command Rollover: Every 255.
commandNumber - The requested AntPlusControlsPcc.AudioVideoCommandNumber
commandData - Indicates additional parameters of the command, for example, the percentage amount of volume increase/decrease in the case of volume up/down.
Returns:
The AntPlusControlsPcc.CommandStatus of the received command. Subscribers can indicate whether the command was successful or not, etc.
